Reviews.Content: booked lateroomscom guise getting £150 studio bargain price £55 night blind wouldnt paid arrived hour check wasnt ready finally discovered hang clothes apart looked half wardrobe beds 3 single beds basement onto dingy courtyard wilting plants pots hotel smelt people drilling screwing painting corridors hours day night staff spoke english rude uncaring tv aerial anyway curtains bird poo hole ceiling light dust hard clothes toilet roll holder broken doors corridors wall bricks door stoppers planks wood laid corridors evening treated sounded baby elephants rampaging beds hard duvets filled folded blankets sheets clean bathroom continental breakfast consisted toast cereal juice coffee boards nailed walls cover holes reception bar decent hotel 20 minutes bar serve drink reception staff particularly unhelpful failing tell card activated day refused local police station contact urgent unrelated matter whilst staying service available existent definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “call this a hotel. nothing more than a dos house”

Reviews.Content: shutting revamp staff grasp basic english booked twin kick hole wall sheets clean bathroom disgusting corriders hotel paid english breakfast apparently coco pops own toast looks ok outside enter own risk

Reviews.Title: “what do u expect for that rates!!!”
Reviews.Author: halilCyprus
Reviews.Content: ve paid 240 gbp 6 nights 3 adults baby yes refurbishing terrible ve stayed 110 clean sheets clean pillows bring immediately cot baby clean bathroom kettle tea coffee tea coffee clean cups bed comfortable floor noisy deluxe hotel pay ok sleeping dont forget breakfast lots cereals toasts butter jam

Reviews.Content: rang hotel morning check stated check late wasnt reservation book hotel told desk clerk stay booked 2 triple ensuites tried bearing mind paid front argued paid key 3 bunk beds 2 correctly screw fell middle night window cracked massive stain carpet hairdryer promised interenet 10 tissues floors beads 2 3 left insect bites clean key security guard letting bed pressed cooker health saftey finest complaining night morning hotel manager able morning continental breakfast consisted coco pops toast ina suit doing shouting staff raised voice guest dared question fine example customer service peter hotel manager complain stated spoke staff rude wished nice stay wouldnt hear rest complaint speaking deputy promise wouldnt stay recommend hotel considering booking please rememeber

Reviews.Title: “Basil and Sybil live on at Queens Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: eagles111169
Reviews.Content: booked queens hotel yesterday evening watching football people reception check told computer mistake charging double card refund mistake near half hour key cards single ensuite clean set bunk beds cooker fridge maybe friend cook own breakfast evening crystal palace hotel friend struggled roomit bunch foreign students seek manager sorted buck stays bar refuse scottish £20 mentioned legal tender

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Surprise!!”
Reviews.Author: tonybolton40
Reviews.Content: read reviews little sceptical stayed nights week found hotel staff friendly especially guy bar clean spacious represented value money plus atmosphere bar evening ive spent god nights 4 5 star hotels theres dog drinking expensive drinks bars week business hotel location value money ideal

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: littlelegs90
Reviews.Content: booked cheap getaway girlfriend wish hadnt am travel agent trust review tend bother stay clean called hotel previously request nice clean bit worried reading reviews arrived fine check friend laugh booked triple unfortunately girls couldnt 2 double beds dated flung fussy boozy weekend except charge phones plug sockets hanging wall mention floor found bed checking plug sockets yuck bathroom hairs aswell called reception look advised straight 15 mins called apologised sending 45 minutes eventually receptionist apologised busy weddings etc anyway disgusted actually taking phones reception half hour charge weekend stay recommend crystal palace train station 10 minutes walk hotel handy definately stay else time visit london

Reviews.Content: worst hotel misfortune stay fooled exterior looks grand night inside enormous hostel dreadful stayed husband bigger caravan double bed pushed wall bigger king size bed quilt double bed fit bed yuk yuk yuk

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as we expected!”
Reviews.Author: little_red89
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights bit wary reading online reviews bad maybe lucky double spacious clean towels bedding changed day hot water tv fine breakfast basic job cereal toast tea etc hotel ten minute walk crystal palace station lots shops eat staff encountered friendly pleasant admittedly redecoration youre looking reasonably priced head night queens hotel job return short stay

Reviews.Title: “Does what it says on the tin!”

Reviews.Content: mum cheap cheerful hotel five nights reluctantly booked fearing worst pleasant surprise hotel basic frills admittedly price cant complain clean surprisingly beds ridiculously comfortable worst stay inconsiderate partygoers load noise mess keeping awake night id budget hopefully removed 24 hour service available sign reception service actually available 3 11pm

Reviews.Content: pay paid £35 night double price little check tripadvisor checked bookings sorted lucky booked equal poor quality corridors filthy doors holes opended door bleach marks carpet front ensuite wall lights hanging walls shade wallpaper coming walls window sill lot paint missing iron marks chair flat screen tv aerial reception ensuite disgusting tiles bath try finger mess ceramic soap dish bath smashed sharp edges taps chrome worn taps properly toilet handle hanging exterior hotel recently painted white ther cracks exterior walls daughters bad family funeral following day walked
